name: R (Ali Saneei)
description:
When you begin, several rocks will fall. Colliding with them makes you lose some of your health. Survive!

This game is about Anti-Black Racism and how it will not last forever. Those rocks represent racism. However, the player character is stronger. And the rocks will eventually disappear. 

While this game is focused on one type of racism, its message applies to all of its forms.

Controls:

Move: A, D or left arrow, right arrow

Jump: Left click
